In the last 75 years, in good times and in bad times, Social Security has paid out every nickel owed to every eligible beneficiary at a relatively modest administrative cost, said Sen. . Kyle Korver was mobbed by his wildly celebrating teammates. Boston Pops players sat dazed on the bench. A third overtime was on deck. Allen Iverson simply pumped his fist, his face expressionless as if he expected it. Kyle Korver hit that big shot and I was thinking,` If he hit that shot, we've got to win it, he said. After Kyle Korver sent the game into a third overtime, Chris Webber delivered a clutch steal and secured the Philadelphia 76ers' 125-124 victory over the Celtics on Friday night.`` It was an amazing game,
